text: ‘‘Allahanannu, avanu namage kalisikottiruva sandesavannu mattu avanu ibrahim, ismayil, is'hak, ya'akub hagu avara (ya'akub‌ra) santatigalige kalisikottidda sandesavannu mattu musa hagu isarige mattu itarella pravadigalige avara odeyana kadeyinda enannu nidalagitto adannu navu nambiddeve. Navu avara paiki yara naduveyu taratamya maduvudilla mattu navu avanige ‘muslim’ agiruvevu (saranagiruvevu)’’endu nivu ghosisiri
